question: Analyze the social media presence and engagement trends of companies in the technology industry.

subtasks.task: Identify all companies in the technology industry from the CompanyInfo table.
Fetch social media engagement metrics from the CompanyFacebookDetail, CompanyInstagramDetail, CompanyTwitterDetail, and CompanyYoutubeDetail tables based on the identified technology companies.
Aggregate the engagement metrics to analyze overall social media performance trends (likes, comments, engagement rate) across platforms.
Create a summary report of the aggregated data, including insights on which platform has the highest engagement for technology companies.
